data.eml:eml: A new species and record of Aceria (Acari: Prostigmata: Eriophyoidea) on Carlina spp. (Asteraceae) from Serbia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vidović, Biljana (2014): A new species and record of Aceria (Acari: Prostigmata: Eriophyoidea) on Carlina spp. (Asteraceae) from Serbia. Zootaxa 3838 (4): 486-494, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3838.4.7
